14.3 Model Evaluation Test Harness
In this section, we will develop a test harness for developing and evaluating diﬀerent types of
neural network models for univariate time series forecasting. This test harness is a modiﬁed
version of the framework presented in Chapter 11 and may cover much of the same of the same
